credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
title: Sampler
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Gummed label reads "Bought at Pottstown, PA.  $15."
medium:
Medium: wool embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted cross stitch on spaced, plain weave cotton foundation (Penelope canvas)
description: A church with a steeple, a large figure of a priest, and scattered motifs of a cornucopia, birds, butterfies, and a flowering plant fill the ground. At the top, IHS is encircled by a floral wreath supported by cherubs.
name: Sampler
